name: Take Care
description:
This a piece created specifically for the exhibition "Type the Message". A collective exhibition held by 2 Carry On.

In this piece the artist Marco Almeida from 2 Carry On decided to create a typographic universe, in which all letters are different from themselves. Creating a visual message strong, rich and appealing ...

Mixed Media on Wood, 33×55

name: Frankenstein Kiss
description:
The kiss of Frankenstein is a piece created specifically for the exhibition Cine-Incrivél. A collective exhibition held by 2 Carry On, and with a group of 30 artists to make an assessment in cinema. 

In this piece the artist Marco Almeida from 2 Carry On decided to immortalize the Franksenstein kiss.

This piece glows in the dark**

Mixed Media on Canvas, 70×100
